          "content": {
            "application/json": {

                "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",

                "type": "object",

                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event name."

                    "type": "integer",

                    "type": "object",

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID for the meeting statistics."

                            "type": "array",

                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service ID."
                                },
                                "mmr_service_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service name."
                                },
                                "meeting_zone": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's meeting zone."
                                },
                                "sfu_mode_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of participants in SFU meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "private_mode_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of participants in private meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "total_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of participants in all types of meetings on the MMR."

                                  "description": "The number of onging SFU meetings on the MMR."
                                },

                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of onging private meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "total_meeting_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of onging meetings on the MMR."
                                },

                                  "description": "The timestamp of the data being collected."

                                "meeting_zone"
                              ]
                            }
                          },

                            "type": "array",

                              "type": "object",

    "node.server_stat": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [

        ],
        "operationId": "node.server_stat",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# node.server_stat\n\nThe **Server statistics** event is triggered every 1 minute. Node server data is collected and sent via this event.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan with a [Zoom Node license](https://www.zoom.com/en/products/zoom-node/).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Server statistics** subscription enabled under the **Zoom Node** event type.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:server_stat:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `node.server_stat`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
                "title": "Server statistics",
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "A timestamp for when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID for the recording statistics."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the recording statistics.",
                        "properties": {
                          "stats": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {

                                "type": "string",

                                    "status"

    "node.zhm_stat": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "node"
        ],
        "operationId": "node.zhm_stat",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# node.zhm_stat\n\nThe **Hybrid Meeting statistics** event is triggered every 1 minute. Meeting data is collected and sent via this event.\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* The account **must** have a [Zoom Node license](https://www.zoom.com/en/products/zoom-node/).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Hybrid Meeting statistics** subscription enabled under the **Zoom Node** event type.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:meeting_stat:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `node.zhm_stat`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
                "title": "Hybrid meeting statistics",
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "A timestamp for when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID for the meeting statistics."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the meeting statistics.",
                        "properties": {
                          "mmr_stats": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Information about the Multi Media Router (MMR).",
                              "properties": {
                                "mmr_service_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service ID."
                                },
                                "mmr_service_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service name."
                                },
                                "meeting_zone": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The MMR's meeting zone."
                                },
                                "sfu_mode_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of participants in SFU meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "private_mode_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of participants in private meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "total_participant_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of participants in all types of meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "sfu_mode_meeting_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of onging SFU meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "private_mode_meeting_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The number of onging private meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "total_meeting_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of onging meetings on the MMR."
                                },
                                "timestamp": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The timestamp of the data being collected."
                                }
                              },
                              "required": [
                                "mmr_service_id",
                                "mmr_service_name",
                                "meeting_zone"
                              ]
                            }
                          },
                          "zc_stats": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Information about the zone controller.",
                              "properties": {
                                "zc_service_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The zone controller's Zoom Node service ID."
                                },
                                "zc_service_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The zone controller's Zoom Node service name."
                                },
                                "meeting_zone": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The meeting zone's name."
                                }
                              },
                              "required": [
                                "zc_service_id",
                                "zc_service_name",
                                "meeting_zone"
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        },

                        ]
                      }
                    },
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"

                  }
                },
                "required": [

                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ]
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"node.zhm_stat\",\n  \"event_ts\": 290112312321,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"mmr_stats\": [\n        {\n          \"mmr_service_id\": \"4444AAAiAAAAAiAiAiiAii==\",\n          \"mmr_service_name\": \"test MMR1\",\n          \"meeting_zone\": \"test-zone\",\n          \"sfu_mode_participant_count\": 5,\n          \"private_mode_participant_count\": 8,\n          \"total_participant_count\": 13,\n          \"sfu_mode_meeting_count\": 1,\n          \"private_mode_meeting_count\": 2,\n          \"total_meeting_count\": 3,\n          \"timestamp\": \"2024-05-27T04:50:09Z\"\n        }\n      ],\n      \"zc_stats\": [\n        {\n          \"zc_service_id\": \"4444AAAiAAAAAiAiAiiAii==\",\n          \"zc_service_name\": \"test ZC1\",\n          \"meeting_zone\": \"test-zone\"\n        }\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
                  "title": "Hybrid meeting statistics",
                  "type": "object",
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",

                            "type": "array",

                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service ID."

                                  "description": "The MMR's Zoom Node service name."

                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of meeting participants on the MMR."
                                },
                                "total_meeting_count": {
                                  "type": "integer",
                                  "description": "The total number of onging meetings on the MMR."

                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Information about the zone controller.",
                              "properties": {
                                "zc_service_id": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The zone controller's Zoom Node service ID."
                                },
                                "zc_service_name": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The zone controller's Zoom Node service name."
                                },
                                "meeting_zone": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The meeting zone's name."
                                }
                              },
                              "required": [
                                "zc_service_id",
                                "zc_service_name",
                                "meeting_zone"
                              ]
                            }
                          }
                        },
                        "required": [
                          "mmr_stats",
                          "zc_stats"
                        ]
                      }
                    },
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ]
                  }
                },

                  "payload"
                ]

    "node.zhm_zone_stat_alert": {

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# node.zhm_zone_stat_alert\nThe **Hybrid meeting zone statistics alert** event is triggered when the corresponding alert fires. Alert data is collected and sent via this event.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan with a [Zoom Node license](https://www.zoom.com/en/products/zoom-node/).\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n  * A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n  * The **Hybrid meeting zone statistics alert** subscription enabled under the **Zoom Node** event type.\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:admin`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_node:read:alert:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `node.zhm_zone_stat_alert`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema",
                "title": "Schema for per zone hybrid meeting statistics alert",
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "A timestamp when the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {

                        "properties": {

                            "type": "string",

                              "meeting_stat_per_zone"
                            ]
                          },

                            "description": "The alert field name.",

                              "p2p_meeting_count",

                              "private_meeting_count",
                              "sfu_client_count",
                              "private_client_count",
                              "meeting_utilization"

                              "error",
                              "fatal"
                            ]
                          },

                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "Meeting zone name."
                          }
                        },
                        "required": [
                          "metric",
                          "field",
                          "value",
                          "threshold",
                          "operator",
                          "level",
                          "zone"
                        ]
                      }

                      "object"
                    ]

                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ]
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"node.zhm_zone_stat_alert\",\n  \"event_ts\": 290112312321,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"metric\": \"meeting_stat_per_zone\",\n      \"field\": \"client_count\",\n      \"value\": 0.0,\n      \"threshold\": 0.0,\n      \"operator\": \">=\",\n      \"level\": \"error\",\n      \"zone\": \"batch-install-zone\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }

            }
          }
        },
